pr_title: [PDS-111849] Rolling in the Deep, Part 1: Failing Test & Rerouting Internode Calls Through Proxies

timeline.bodyText: This test will fail even if the buildup occurs in the warmup period. Maybe at least indicate in the reason for failure if it occurred during warmup or after we simulated shutting down?
timeline.author: gmaretic

replies.bodyText: Alright, will do. Yeah, that seems unlikely, but good to catch :)
replies.author: jeremyk-91

timeline.bodyText: Extract a method indicating that this simulates the node shutting down?
timeline.author: gmaretic
